message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.DL. 

The paper deals with information retrieval in networks of documents, which is a task related to information retrieval (cs.IR). The proposed method leverages dense node and content representations learned with embedding techniques, which are commonly used in natural language processing (cs.CL) and machine learning (cs.LG, cs.DL). The paper also assumes that the topology of the network and the content of the documents correlate, which is a topic related to social networks (cs.SI).
